title: Past is prologue: a camera view of a new Norway
brief_description: Contrasts the 1100th anniversary of Tonsberg with industry and modern technology. Looks briefly at heavy industry, ship-building, the commissioning of a new oil tanker, and the extent of off-shore drilling. Modern sculpture and space age architecture finish this survey of the new Norway.
